AGOADataCenter.name: AGOA Data Center
AGOADataCenter.description: The African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) was signed into law on May 18, 2000 as Title 1 of The Trade and Development Act of 2000. The Act offers tangible incentives for African countries to continue their efforts to open their economies and build free markets.

AidData.name: AidData
AidData.description: AidData is a research and innovation lab making information on development finance more accessible and actionable. Tracking more than $6 trillion dollars from 90 donor agencies, AidData works with leading development organizations to improve the transparency and effectiveness of aid.

AWSPublicDatasets.name: AWS Public Datasets
AWSPublicDatasets.description: Amazon Web Services provides a variety of public datasets that anyone can access from within the cloud. This includes data from the Human Genome Project, the US Census, and the New York Times.

BankForInternationalSettlementsStatistic.name: Bank for International Settlements Statistics
BankForInternationalSettlementsStatistic.description: The Bank for International Settlements (BIS) is an international financial institution owned by central banks which fosters international monetary and financial cooperation and serves as a bank for central banks. The BIS also provides statistics on international banking and financial markets.

BPStatisticalReviewOfWorldEnergy.name: BP Statistical Review of World Energy
BPStatisticalReviewOfWorldEnergy.description: The BP Statistical Review of World Energy is an annual publication that provides data on world energy markets. It is widely considered to be an authoritative source of global energy statistics.

BerkelyLibraryDataLab.name: Berkely Library: Data Lab
BerkelyLibraryDataLab.description: The Data Lab at the University of California, Berkeley provides access to a wide range of data resources, including databases, software, and training materials.

CIAWorldFactbook.name: CIA World Factbook
CIAWorldFactbook.description: The World Factbook provides information on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for 267 world entities.

CenterForInternationalEarthScienceInform.name: Center for International Earth Science Information Network
CenterForInternationalEarthScienceInform.description: CIESIN is a center within the Earth Institute at Columbia University that provides access to a wide range of data resources related to human interactions in the environment.

CEPII.name: CEPII
CEPII.description: CEPII is a French research center that provides data on international economics, including trade, foreign direct investment, and exchange rates.

DataGovUk.name: Data.gov.uk
DataGovUk.description: Data.gov.uk provides access to a wide range of UK government data, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

DBPedia.name: DBPedia
DBPedia.description: DBPedia is a community-driven project that extracts structured information from Wikipedia and makes it available on the web.

EuropeanUnionOpenDataPortal.name: European Union Open Data Portal
EuropeanUnionOpenDataPortal.description: The European Union Open Data Portal provides access to a wide range of data resources from the European Union, including statistics on agriculture, trade, and the environment.

Eurostat.name: Eurostat
Eurostat.description: Eurostat is the statistical office of the European Union and provides data on a wide range of economic, social, and environmental topics.

Freebase.name: Freebase
Freebase.description: Freebase is a community-driven database that provides structured information on a wide range of topics, including people, places, and things.

GapminderWorld.name: Gapminder World
GapminderWorld.description: Gapminder World provides access to a wide range of data on global development, including health, education, and income.

GlobalEDGEDatabaseOfInternationalBusines.name: globalEDGE Database of International Business Statistics
GlobalEDGEDatabaseOfInternationalBusines.description: globalEDGE is a knowledge web-portal that connects international business professionals worldwide to a wealth of information, insights, and learning resources on global business activities.

GoogleFinance.name: Google Finance
GoogleFinance.description: Google Finance provides access to a wide range of financial data, including stock prices, company information, and market news.

GooglePublicDataExplorer.name: Google Public Data Explorer
GooglePublicDataExplorer.description: Google Public Data Explorer provides access to a wide range of public data, including statistics on population, health, and the economy.

GovernmentOfCanadaOpenData.name: Government of Canada Open Data
GovernmentOfCanadaOpenData.description: The Government of Canada Open Data portal provides access to a wide range of data resources from the Canadian government, including statistics on the economy, health, and the environment.

HISPiers.name: HIS Piers
HISPiers.description: HIS Piers provides access to a wide range of data on global trade, including import and export statistics, shipping data, and market trends.

HumanDevelopmentReports.name: Human Development Reports
HumanDevelopmentReports.description: The Human Development Reports provide data on a wide range of human development indicators, including health, education, and income.

InternationalLabourComparisons.name: International Labour Comparisons
InternationalLabourComparisons.description: The International Labour Comparisons program prepares economic indicators and comparisons of employment, compensation, productivity, and consumer prices for a range of countries.

InternationalTradeCenter.name: International Trade Center
InternationalTradeCenter.description: The International Trade Center provides access to a wide range of data on international trade, including export and import statistics, market trends, and trade regulations.

ILOSTAT.name: ILOSTAT
ILOSTAT.description: ILOSTAT provides access to a wide range of data on labor markets, including employment, unemployment, and wages.

ILOWorldEmploymentAndSocialOutlookTrends.name: ILO World Employment and Social Outlook Trends
ILOWorldEmploymentAndSocialOutlookTrends.description: The World Employment and Social Outlook Trends report provides data on global employment trends, including unemployment, underemployment, and working poverty.

IMFWorldEconomicOutlookDatabase.name: IMF World Economic Outlook Database
IMFWorldEconomicOutlookDatabase.description: The IMF World Economic Outlook Database provides data on the global economy, including economic growth, inflation, and trade.

IndexMundi.name: Index Mundi
IndexMundi.description: Index Mundi provides access to a wide range of data on countries and regions, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

InternationalEnergyAgencyStatistics.name: International Energy Agency Statistics
InternationalEnergyAgencyStatistics.description: The International Energy Agency provides data on global energy markets, including oil, gas, coal, and renewable energy.

Junar.name: Junar
Junar.description: Junar is a cloud-based open data platform that provides access to a wide range of data resources from governments, organizations, and companies.

Knoema.name: Knoema
Knoema.description: Knoema is a knowledge platform that provides access to a wide range of data resources, including statistics, time-series data, and visualizations.

LandMatrix.name: LandMatrix
LandMatrix.description: The Land Matrix is an online database that provides access to a wide range of data on large-scale land acquisitions, including information on investors, target countries, and land deals.

Latinobarometro.name: Latinobarometro
Latinobarometro.description: Latinobarometro is an annual public opinion survey that provides data on political, economic, and social issues in Latin America.

LibraryUniversityOfMichiganStatisticsAnd.name: Library, University of Michigan: Statistics and Datasets
LibraryUniversityOfMichiganStatisticsAnd.description: The University of Michigan Library provides access to a wide range of data resources, including statistics, datasets, and research guides.

NationMaster.name: Nation Master
NationMaster.description: Nation Master provides access to a wide range of data on countries and regions, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

OECDData.name: OECD Data
OECDData.description: The OECD provides access to a wide range of data on economic, social, and environmental topics, including statistics on GDP, employment, and education.

OECDFactbook.name: OECD Factbook
OECDFactbook.description: The OECD Factbook provides data on a wide range of economic, social, and environmental indicators for OECD countries.

OpenDataNetwork.name: Open Data Network
OpenDataNetwork.description: The Open Data Network provides access to a wide range of data resources from governments, organizations, and companies, including statistics, time-series data, and visualizations.

PaulHenselsGeneralInformationalDataPage.name: Paul Hensel’s General Informational Data Page
PaulHenselsGeneralInformationalDataPage.description: Paul Hensel’s General Informational Data Page provides access to a wide range of data resources on international relations, including datasets on conflict, trade, and alliances.

PennWorldTable.name: Penn World Table
PennWorldTable.description: The Penn World Table provides data on economic growth, productivity, and international trade for a wide range of countries.

PewResearchCenter.name: Pew Research Center
PewResearchCenter.description: The Pew Research Center provides access to a wide range of data resources on social and political issues, including surveys, reports, and datasets.

PopulationReferenceBureauDataFinder.name: Population Reference Bureau Data Finder
PopulationReferenceBureauDataFinder.description: The Population Reference Bureau Data Finder provides access to a wide range of data on population, health, and the environment.

PRSRiskIndicators.name: PRS Risk Indicators
PRSRiskIndicators.description: The PRS Risk Indicators provide data on political risk, economic performance, and social stability for a wide range of countries.

SESRICBasicSocialAndEconomicIndicators.name: SESRIC Basic Social and Economic Indicators
SESRICBasicSocialAndEconomicIndicators.description: The Statistical, Economic and Social Research and Training Centre for Islamic Countries (SESRIC) provides access to a wide range of data on social and economic indicators for Islamic countries.

SESRICDatabases.name: SESRIC Databases
SESRICDatabases.description: The Statistical, Economic and Social Research and Training Centre for Islamic Countries (SESRIC) provides access to a wide range of data resources on Islamic countries, including statistics on population, health, and the economy.

Statista.name: Statista
Statista.description: Statista is a statistics portal that provides access to a wide range of data resources on business, media, and society.

TheAtlasOfEconomicComplexity.name: The Atlas of Economic Complexity
TheAtlasOfEconomicComplexity.description: The Atlas of Economic Complexity provides access to a wide range of data on economic complexity, including trade, growth, and development.

TheDataAndStoryLibrary.name: The Data and Story Library
TheDataAndStoryLibrary.description: The Data and Story Library provides access to a wide range of data resources on a variety of topics, including statistics, data analysis, and visualization.

TradingEconomics.name: Trading Economics
TradingEconomics.description: Trading Economics provides access to a wide range of data on economic indicators, including GDP, inflation, and unemployment.

TransparencyOrgCorruptionPerceptionIndex.name: Transparency.org Corruption Perception Index
TransparencyOrgCorruptionPerceptionIndex.description: Transparency International is a global movement that seeks to combat corruption and promote transparency in government. The Corruption Perception Index ranks countries based on their perceived levels of corruption.

UNCOMTRADEDatabase.name: UN COMTRADE Database
UNCOMTRADEDatabase.description: The UN COMTRADE Database provides access to a wide range of data on international trade, including import and export statistics, tariffs, and market trends.

UNCTADCountryFactSheets.name: UNCTAD Country Fact Sheets
UNCTADCountryFactSheets.description: The UNCTAD Country Fact Sheets provide data on a wide range of economic, social, and environmental indicators for countries around the world.

UNCTADInvestmentCountryProfiles.name: UNCTAD Investment Country Profiles
UNCTADInvestmentCountryProfiles.description: The UNCTAD Investment Country Profiles provide data on foreign direct investment, trade, and economic indicators for countries around the world.

UNCTADSTAT.name: UNCTAD STAT
UNCTADSTAT.description: UNCTAD STAT provides access to a wide range of data on trade, investment, and development indicators for countries around the world.

UNData.name: UN Data
UNData.description: UN Data provides access to a wide range of data resources from the United Nations, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

UNDPsHumanDevelopmentIndex.name: UNDPs Human Development Index
UNDPsHumanDevelopmentIndex.description: The Human Development Index is a composite measure of human development that combines indicators of health, education, and income.

UNECE.name: UNECE
UNECE.description: The United Nations Economic Commission for Europe provides access to a wide range of data on economic, social, and environmental indicators for countries in the UNECE region.

UNESCOInstituteForStatistics.name: UNESCO Institute for Statistics
UNESCOInstituteForStatistics.description: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides access to a wide range of data on education, science, and culture.

UNIDOStatisticalDatabases.name: UNIDO Statistical Databases
UNIDOStatisticalDatabases.description: The United Nations Industrial Development Organization provides access to a wide range of data on industrial development, including manufacturing, trade, and technology.

UNStatsSocialIndicators.name: UNStats Social Indicators
UNStatsSocialIndicators.description: The United Nations Statistics Division provides access to a wide range of data on social indicators, including health, education, and income.

UpsalaConflictDataProgram.name: Upsala Conflict Data Program
UpsalaConflictDataProgram.description: The Upsala Conflict Data Program provides access to a wide range of data on armed conflicts, peace agreements, and peacekeeping operations.

USDataAndStatistics.name: US Data and Statistics
USDataAndStatistics.description: USA.gov provides access to a wide range of data resources from the US government, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

WHOData.name: WHO Data
WHOData.description: The World Health Organization provides access to a wide range of data on health indicators, including disease, mortality, and life expectancy.

WorldBankData.name: World Bank Data
WorldBankData.description: The World Bank provides access to a wide range of data on economic, social, and environmental indicators for countries around the world.

WorldBankDataBank.name: World Bank Data
WorldBankDataBank.description: The World Bank provides access to a wide range of data on economic, social, and environmental indicators for countries around the world.

WorldBankDoingBusiness.name: World Bank Doing Business
WorldBankDoingBusiness.description: The Doing Business project provides objective measures of business regulations for local firms in 189 economies and selected cities at the subnational level.

WorldBankEnterpriseSurveys.name: World Bank Enterprise Surveys
WorldBankEnterpriseSurveys.description: The Enterprise Surveys provide data on the business environment in 135 countries, including the investment climate, access to finance, and corruption.

WorldBankInvestingAcrossBorders.name: World Bank Investing Across Borders
WorldBankInvestingAcrossBorders.description: Investing Across Borders provides data on foreign direct investment regulations in 87 countries, including information on entry, operations, and exit.

WorldIntegratedTradeSolution.name: World Integrated Trade Solution
WorldIntegratedTradeSolution.description: The World Integrated Trade Solution provides access to a wide range of data on international trade, including import and export statistics, tariffs, and market trends.

WTOStatistics.name: WTO Statistics
WTOStatistics.description: The World Trade Organization provides access to a wide range of data on international trade, including import and export statistics, tariffs, and market trends.

Vizala.name: Vizala
Vizala.description: Vizala is a data visualization platform that provides access to a wide range of data resources on countries and regions, including statistics on the economy, population, and environment.

Zanran.name: Zanran
Zanran.description: Zanran is a search engine for data and statistics that provides access to a wide range of data resources on a variety of topics, including business, science, and technology.
